actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-7.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #8 (253-119).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on House Administration.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-7) Authorizes the expenditure of funds not to exceed $845,000 for investigations and studies conducted by the Committee on House Administration. Declares that no part of these funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated by any other House committee. States that the authorization granted by this resolution shall expire on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on House Administration.
